title: Motility Activator | Integrative Therapeutics®
description: Motility Activator consists of standardized extracts of artichoke (Cynara cardunculus) and ginger (Zingiber officinale) and supports gastrointestinal motility and transport.* This patented combination has been the subject of two human randomized controlled trials.
cleaned_text: officinale and supports gastrointestinal motility and transport.* This patented combination has been the subject of two human randomized controlled trials. SUPPORTS GASTROINTESTINAL MOTILITY AND TRANSPORT* Motility officinale and supports gastrointestinal motility and transport.* This patented combination has been the subject of two human randomized controlled trials. INGREDIENTS 100mg Clinically Studied Proprietary Extract ** Daily Value (DV) not established Percent daily value is based on a 2000 calorie diet Other Ingredients Motility Activator Does Not Contain Gluten Corn Soy Dairy Colors Artificial Flavors Wheat Preservatives Other Details Pycrinil® is a registered trademark 12239 DIRECTIONS Motility Activator Directions and/or DosageAdults take 1 capsule twice daily, or as recommended by a healthcare professional. WarningDo not use if you have a bile duct obstruction, or if you are allergic to plants of the Asteraceae (Compositae) family, including ragweed. If you are pregnant, nursing, have gallstones, or if you are taking prescription drugs, consult a healthcare professional before use. Keep out of reach of children. Safety sealed with inner seal. Do not use if seal is broken or missing. Keep tightly closed. Store at room temperature. Avoid excessive heat and direct sunlight.
